commitResults.messageTitle: Made chatbot recite its name, greet the user, before saying goodbye
Implemented Echo functionality Implemented Exit functionality upon using 'bye' command
Added Storage class Added feature to add tasks as well as to display tasks
Added feature to mark tasks as done or undone
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, tasks are only listed with descriptions

This means that we cannot tell if they are done or not, which defeats the purpose of a todoList

This commit will implement such a feature

commitResults.messageTitle: Implmented ToDos, Events, Deadlines to replace generic Tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, every task is seen as the same, and one is unable to specify deadlines

This lack of customisability means that it is difficult to see when tasks start and end, or to differentiate tasks

Adding these features makes it clearer which category a task belongs to

commitResults.messageTitle: Edited the Expected Output file from the program
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, expected output is the standard boilerplate

This does not reflect the new features added to the chatbot

Through changing the Expected.txt file, allow us to have automated testing

Current State: No error message displayed when an invalid keyword was provided, or a task added without desciprtion

What was Wrong: This meant that any random keyword could be entered, or invalid tasks could be added

How Commit changes Current State:Error checking to ensure that the above does not take place

commitResults.messageTitle: Subject: Added feature to delete tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Current State: Only can add tasks, but unable to delete

What was Wrong: No feature present to remove tasks if they were no longer neccessary

How Commit changes Current State: Allows deletion of redundant tasks
